TopicTitle: [AAR] The Grand Tour - Voyage To The Planets

Articles.Content: Next chapter is gonna be a big one. So I'll wait as long as need be.
Last sneak-peak screenshot before the update:
What could this be? A probe? A lander? What ships we know have these round solar panels on them? Any conspiracies?

What could this be? A probe? A lander? What ships we know have these round solar panels on them? Any conspiracies?

Looks like a LAMGML to me...
Yes, I think that's a LAMGML.

If that's a LAMGML, it's being deployed a bit too high, I think...

Although looking at the rest of the body, it doesn't really look like this... Or it's just me.

Also, what mod do you use for the first person shots? KerbCam?

Edited February 22, 2014 by Maxilica
It does have the solar panels of a LAMGML and the hull looks the same... plus there's no LAMGML docked to Proteus.
Ike Station! It looks high because of its elliptical orbit around Ike

Ike Station! It looks high because of its elliptical orbit around Ike

I think that the LAMGML is actually a part of the Ike station camouflaged to look like Duna, but it's really pol.

Pelease!!

More!

Pelease!!

More!

I agree with this statement.

I agree with this statement.

A writer is never late, nor is he early, he arrives precisely when he means to.

A writer is never late, nor is he early, he arrives precisely when he means to.

*tries to keep a straight face*

A writer is never late, nor is he early, he arrives precisely when he means to.

Just a little more patience please.

ok.

5 SECONDS LATER

GIVE ME MORE!!!
What happened to the Eeloo stage of the tour while I was gone?

Without giving too much away, what basically happened was:

"Screw it, let's go home!"
Meanwhile: No one dares to ask, but everyone is dying for the next chapter

I have finished reading all the chapters and I must say, never has a fan-work made me stare at a forum for about two hours or more. Truly amazing, a very well written tale with an amazing story. My guts ache with so many cliffhangers You are one talented writer, and I await eagerly for the next chapters, I really hope we get answers, as well as references to the Space Race and Kadmos. I am just speechless.

Of the two I prefer the Grand Tour over the Space Race, because it is fictional, reading the Space Race you already have a general idea of what is going to happen, save some variations and kerbish moments. Both truly amazing works! Keep up with the good work!

If this has not been previously asked, what version is this on, and what mods is it using?

Meanwhile: No one dares to ask, but everyone is dying for the next chapter

Safe to say it isn't going to be pretty, especially after such a length of time...

everyone is dying *in the next chapter

FTFY. Remember: Czok is Mean

The silence... I feel a disturbance in the force... Czok is gathering all his George RR Martin powers to cast down a hellfire of death and smashed keyboards... beware! Also, when do these guys eat some snacks? Kerbal's top research priority should be figuring how to eat a snack with a helmet on. Some desperate kerbonauts have gone as far as removing the helmets D:
hello? anyone gonna give an update on the new chapter?

hello? anyone gonna give an update on the new chapter?

Greatness takes time. Rest assured that when Czok drops a new chapter, it'll be worth the wait.

Though I do hope for sooner rather than later!

Sorry for the delay although you should know that I'm not intending to make this break between chapters longer than 3 weeks. I wanted to write a little during the weekend but with Russia invading our neighbour and NATO armies possibly being deployed on Polish soil in the next week I can't really concentrate on the story right now.
